SELECT USR_NO, USR_EML, USR_PWD, USR_NM, USR_PHN_NO, DATA_OWNR_ID, USR_GRADE, (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1003' AND DITC_CD = USR_GRADE AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS USR_GRADE_VAL, USR_AUTH, (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1002' AND DITC_CD = USR_AUTH AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS USR_AUTH_VAL, USR_APRV, (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1010' AND DITC_CD = USR_AUTH AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS USR_APRV_VAL, DEL_YN, REG_USR_NO,
DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, UPD_USR_NO, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPD_DT FROM TB_COMM_USER WHERE 1=1
AND (USR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTxt},'%') OR USR_EML LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTxt},'%'))
AND USR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTxt},'%')
AND USR_EML LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTxt},'%')
AND USR_AUTH = #{cbAuth}
AND USR_APRV = #{cbAppv}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_COMM_USER SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND USR_NO = ${usrNo}
